attributes.action: Bring a case for Fraud against the Producers of the ITV shows that rigged phone-in voting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Producers of the ITV shows that rigged phone-in votes and were subsequently fined over £5m should have a case of fraud brought against them by the CPS.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
